title: What are some challenges you think the next generation will face in 2022? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the present is bleak, future will also face the same problem. There is no future without the present. Thinking about the future without caring for the present, is a false promise. What is provided for the present can also be continued for the future. A promise for the future without helping the present is like feeding the unborn baby. Any such promises are mere election stunt.

SHALOM THE challenge of the next generations is to achieve peace (Shalom, in my language, Hebrew) all over as if not, this world, including the people, will be destroyed/demolish by the evil powers that are growing presently. It does not, necessarily, mean 3WW. Small wars will do this crazy job. In friendship Rima
